items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t have enough money to buy everything he needs.
I promised Tom and I really don\'t want to disappoint him.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will show up today.
In retrospect, Tom wishes he had spent more time studying.
Tom put new pedals on the bicycle that he rides to school.
Tom said he wanted to move his chair closer to the window.
Tom says he needs to talk to us about something important.
Tom isn\'t a good enough swimmer to swim across the river.
Tom isn\'t as good at speaking French as I thought he was.
Tom isn\'t the kind of person who loses his temper easily.
